info.name: Job Ki Khoj
info.description: Following are the api endpoints that are to be used to interact with the platform.

item.name: Cron Jobs

request.description: Updates private jobs.
Updates public/govt. jobs.
Updates experience values.
Updates qualification values.
Updates States and their respective districts.
Updates job titles.
Updates job types.

Generates api key, that will be used to authenticate cron jobs request.

Only users with admin role can generate API key.

item.description: Methods to update PGRKAM data on "Job Ki Khoj" platform.

request.description:
User can signup on the platform using their email, and can choose the role either of "jobseeker" or "employer".

OTP will be sent to the specified mail for verfication with a specific TTL.

response.name: Sign Up

request.description: OTP for forgot password or sign up can be verified using this endpoint.
Users can login using their creds.
Forgot password requires your mail and new password, after which OTP will be sent to the specified mail if the user corresponding to that mail exists on the platform.

response.name: Forgot Password

request.description: Jobseekers can add their experience details using this endpoint.
Jobseekers can edit previously added experience details.
Jobseekers can remove a specific experience from their profile.
Jobseekers can clear all the experiences added so far from their profile.
Jobseekers can add their education details using this endpoint.
Jobseekers can edit previously added education detail.
Jobseekers can delete previously added education.
Jobseekers can delete all the education details added so far.
Jobseekers can create their profile which will be required for applying to jobs on "Job Ki Khoj".
Jobseekers can fetch and see their latest profile.

response.name: Get Profile

request.description: Jobseekers can update their contact info.
Jobseekers can update their personal info.
Jobseekers can update their profile pic.
Jobseekrs can update their skills.
Employers can create their profiles which can be used by jobseekers to contact them.
Employers can fetch their profile.
Employers can update their contact info.
Employers can update their personal info.
Employers can update their profile pic.
Users can fetch Govt. Jobs available on PGRKAM portal.

request.description: Employers can create jobs posts for new openings in the company.
Employers can update status of previously opened job posts.
Employers can fetch job posts they posted previously.

response.name: Get Employer's Posted Jobs

item.description: Following endpoints allow employers to perform operations on job posts and their corresponding received applications.

item.name: Jobseeker

request.description: Jobseekers can submit their profile for the mentioned job post.
Jobseekers can remove their profile/application from the previously job post.

item.description: Following endpoints allow jobseekers to perform operations on job applications that they want to submit or update on a specific job post.

request.description: Users can fetch job posts that were posted on "Job Ki Khoj" platform.

response.name: Get Jobs

request.description: Users can fetch specific job post details that was posted on the "Job Ki Khoj" platform.

response.name: Get Job Details
